title: Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar / Peaceful Living
description: Sean and Priyanka gush about their love for Lord of the Rings and discuss how important farting is to their daily routine. Indian yoga guru Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar joins the podcast to reveal his tips on how to stay calm and live a peaceful life.
author: info@hazymills.com (Hazy Mills Network)
